meaningMnemonic: A <radical>big</radical> <radical>turkey</radical> in the <radical>rice paddy</radical> is getting all <kanji>stirred up</kanji>. He's kicking up all the rice. Who stirred him up?
readingMnemonic: While the turkey is <kanji>stirred up</kanji>, it also looks like it's having a lot of <reading>fun</reading> (ふん).
